mapper.select: SELECT a.LECAP_NO, LECSC_DAY, PERIOD_CD, LECSC_HOUR, c.SUB_NM, d.PRO_NM FROM LECTURE_SCHEDULE a JOIN LECTURE_APLY b ON a.LECAP_NO = b.LECAP_NO JOIN SUBJECT c ON b.SUB_NO = c.SUB_NO JOIN professor d ON b.PRO_NO = d.PRO_NO WHERE d.pro_no = #{proNo} AND b.APRV_STTS_CD !='rej' AND b.LECAP_YR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND b.LECAP_SEM = CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE)<= 7 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END
